name: Pop My Corn
description:
Well you are in luck! During the fall game jam at KADK
2018 in Copenhagen one very stupid idea was realized in less
than 48 hours and the product before you today is POP MY CORN, a highly
realistic dating simulator where you, the player, must seduce a sentient husk
of corn. 

Pinch it, rub it, butter it, but most important of all POP IT!
